note: Maps historical administrative names used in source data (XLSX, PDFs) to current names used in TopoJSON (taiwan-atlas). The 22 current top-level divisions are: 臺北市, 新北市, 桃園市, 臺中市, 臺南市, 高雄市, 基隆市, 新竹市, 嘉義市, 新竹縣, 苗栗縣, 彰化縣, 南投縣, 雲林縣, 嘉義縣, 屏東縣, 宜蘭縣, 花蓮縣, 臺東縣, 澎湖縣, 金門縣, 連江縣.

township_renames._note: Context-bound. Key = county (after county normalization), value = {old_township: new_township}. Only entries where the XLSX name differs from the TopoJSON name.

reforms.note: 台/臺 variant. Both forms appear in government documents depending on era and publisher. These are NOT renames — the places are identical. Applied AFTER reform mappings, so these only cover names unchanged by reform (e.g. 臺北市, 臺東縣, etc.).
